pageContext.claim: “And it [vaccine] will end the pandemic. It will end the pandemic....this will vanquish the -- the problem, this horrible scourge -- as I call it, the 'China virus,' because that's where it came from.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often suggests creating a vaccine means the end of the pandemic. Nothing could be further from the truth. It marks an important step in combating the coronavirus, but the pandemic will continue to last for months and life will be difficult to return to normal. A vaccine can help reduce the spread of the disease, but people would still need to maintain social distancing for an undetermined period of time.
